name: Paperflap
description:
This game is about a man who lost his certificate with COVID testing results. Without it, he can't leave his house! Play as a certificate and return to your owner!

This game was made for a GGJ 2021 (TRNAVA Game Jam 2021) The team has never met before.

Evil Mastermind - level/game design

Michal 'geforcefx' Domoracky - 3d assets

Roman 'BaronProsimir' Vaňo - script, level design

Erika 'SisiSo' Csuportová- 2D assets

Denis Sedlák - sound

Peter 'peto184' Pápay - programming

This game is about a man who lost his certificate about COVID testing. Play as a certificate and return to your owner!
